banner_heading: Junior Software and Web Application Developer
paragraph_1: I am a motivated and ambitious young developer, ready to learn the development field. My experience in this position has strengthened my skills in designing, implementing, testing and updating software. I am confident that if given the opportunity, I can be a useful talent for your company
paragraph_2: My main goal is to apply my technical expertise throughout the software lifecycle and ensure the production and delivery of products and services that meet client specifications. Together with a competent team of software developers and with strong personal knowledge, skills and experience in software engineering, I am confident that this goal can be achieved.
